sqlMap.select: SELECT A.GM_CD AS gameCode, A.GM_NAME AS gameName, A.GM_TURN AS gameTurn, B.GM_LIST_NO AS gameListNo, B.MC_CD AS matchCode, C.TM_CD_H AS homeTeamCode, C.TM_CD_A AS awayTeamCode, D.TM_NAME AS homeTeamName, E.TM_NAME AS awayTeamName, C.MC_DATE AS matchDate, C.MC_TIME AS matchTime, C.MC_DAY AS matchDay, C.MC_END AS matchEnd, C.ST_CD AS stadiumCode, C.MC_RESULT AS matchResult, C.SCORE_H AS scoreHome, C.SCORE_A AS scoreAway, C.LG_CD AS lgCd FROM T_INFO_GAME A, T_INFO_GAME_LIST B, T_INFO_MATCH_RECORD C, T_INFO_TEAM D, T_INFO_TEAM E WHERE A.GM_CD = B.GM_CD AND B.MC_CD = C.MC_CD AND C.TM_CD_H = D.TM_CD AND C.TM_CD_A = E.TM_CD AND A.GM_CD = #gmCd# ORDER BY B.GM_LIST_NO

SELECT MAX(A.GM_CD) AS gmCd, MAX(A.GM_END_DATE) AS gmEndDate, MAX(A.GM_TURN) AS gmTurn, MAX(A.GM_SEQ) AS gmSeq FROM T_INFO_GAME A WHERE 1=1
AND A.GM_END = #gmEnd#

SELECT MAX(B.GM_CD) AS gmCd, MAX(A.GM_END_DATE) AS gmEndDate, MAX(A.GM_TURN) AS gmTurn, MAX(A.GM_SEQ) AS gmSeq FROM T_INFO_GAME A, T_INFO_GAME_PICK B WHERE A.GM_CD = B.GM_CD
A.GM_END = #gmEnd#
B.GM_POST_NO = #gmPostNo#

SELECT GM_CD AS gmCd, GM_NAME AS gmName, GM_TURN AS gmTurn, GM_END_DATE AS gmEndDate, GM_END AS gmEnd, GM_SEQ AS gmSeq FROM T_INFO_GAME WHERE 1=1
GM_END = #gmEnd#
GM_CD = #gmCd#
ORDER BY GM_END_DATE DESC

SELECT B.GM_CD AS gmCd, B.GM_NAME AS gmName, A.GM_POST_NO AS gmPostNo, A.GM_POST_CONTENT AS gmPostContent, B.GM_TURN AS gmTurn, B.GM_END_DATE AS gmEndDate, B.GM_END AS gmEnd, B.GM_SEQ AS gmSeq, DATE_FORMAT(A.RG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regDt FROM T_INFO_GAME_PICK A, T_INFO_GAME B WHERE A.GM_CD = B.GM_CD ORDER BY B.GM_CD DESC, GM_POST_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.GM_CD, A.MC_CD, B.MC_DATE, B.SCORE_H, B.SCORE_A, A.GM_RT_WIN/(A.GM_RT_WIN+A.GM_RT_DRAW+A.GM_RT_LOSE)*100 as PRDT_WIN, A.GM_RT_DRAW/(A.GM_RT_WIN+A.GM_RT_DRAW+A.GM_RT_LOSE)*100 as PRDT_DRAW, A.GM_RT_LOSE/(A.GM_RT_WIN+A.GM_RT_DRAW+A.GM_RT_LOSE)*100 as PRDT_LOSS, B.MC_RESULT, C.TM_NAME_BET AS TM_NAME_H, (SELECT TM_NAME_BET FROM T_INFO_TEAM WHERE TM_CD = B.TM_CD_A) AS TM_NAME_A, B.TM_CD_H, B.TM_CD_A FROM T_INFO_GAME_LIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_INFO_MATCH_RECORD B ON A.MC_CD = B.MC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_INFO_TEAM C ON B.TM_CD_H = C.TM_CD WHERE 1=1 AND (B.TM_CD_H = #tmCd# OR B.TM_CD_A = #tmCd#) AND B.MC_END = 'Y' ) A WHERE 1=1 AND (PRDT_WIN > 70 AND MC_RESULT != 'W' AND (TM_CD_H = #tmCd# OR TM_CD_A = #tmCd#)) OR (PRDT_LOSS > 70 AND MC_RESULT != 'L' AND (TM_CD_H = #tmCd# OR TM_CD_A = #tmCd#)) ORDER BY A.MC_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 5
